article_title: How The Fight Over Delegates Will Doom The Republican Presidential Nominee, Whoever It Is

article_metadata.description: The shadowy delegate race that Cruz bested Trump in in Colorado is dangerous for the GOP. If the outcome of the national convention turns on the manipulation of arcane party rules and dodgy political tactics, it will confirm the cynical views of many Republican voters that the process in Washington and in politics at large is broken. Which means a lot of them will likely stay home in November.
article_metadata.author: John McQuaid
